", "answer": "The scheme covers education from Class I to Post Graduate Level/Professional Course, including diploma, vocational training through ITI, postgraduate studies, and professional courses like MBBS/BE. "}, {"question": "Is there any provision for meritorious students pursuing MBBS/BE or professional courses? ", "answer": "Yes, for meritorious students pursuing MBBS/BE or professional courses, the Board may incur the entire cost of study on a case-to-case basis, subject to approval.
